posts.post_content:
Posted By: Tobey

Hi there,

I am after any Lawson's Patent Base Ball Games. Quality not important. I am also after any boxes, rules and loose cards.
Will pay $$$.

Thanks

T

Posted By: Trev
I have an edition of Lawson's Patent baseball card game.  It is the blue-back one and complete.  Putting it on auction on eBay in next few days.  I have some photos of the set on my web page at  [url]http://myweb.tiscali.co.uk/advertisementspace[/url].

Posted By: Tobey
Hi Trev,

Thanks for letting me know. I noticed the bottom of the box is missing. How much are you looking to sell it for and what is your direct email address.

Thanks

Posted By: Trev
Hi,

My asking price would be around 700 US $.   Looking at sets that have sold in recent auctions and going by their condition I think this is a good estimate.   I'm willing to negotiate the price but as I said my intention was to put it for auction.

You can email me at maquina@tiscali.co.uk
